name: Captain of Ages - Episode 1: The Orphans of Time
name_original: Captain of Ages - Episode 1: The Orphans of Time
description:
Navigate your way through Time Lad's constantly changing alien base, blast down  his alien henchmen, defeat the Evil Time Lad and help save The Orphans of Time in this retro minimalist inspired sci-fi fantasy roguelike/roguelite. 

By Apostate Games

For Clickteam's Fusion Wars - Programming Menace Game Jam

#iwanttocreate

NOTE: We noticed a few minor glitches in the boss fight mechanics involving damage. While it does add a fair amount to the difficulty, it's still possible to beat. We will leave it until the Game Jam is over to fix it or tweak it. There were a couple glitchs involving audio and fulsscreen settings, however, that we were able to fix last minute before the jam ended

I should also mention that all music and sfx is CC0 public domain from various sources and most of which were edited by our team.
